title: Automation Exercise
summary: This is a practice website called AutomationExercise for QA engineers of all levels to practice automation and API testing. It provides test cases and API lists for practice, categorized by gender (women, men, kids) and brands (e.g., POLO, H&M).

title: Automation Exercise - Polo Products
summary: This webpage is an online store, specifically showcasing Polo brand products. It features a homepage with navigation links (Products, Cart, Signup/Login, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, Contact us), product categories (WOMEN, MEN, KIDS, BRANDS), and a selection of Polo products with details like price and 'Add to cart' options. Some products also have a 'View Product' option.

title: Automation Exercise - Kookie Kids Products
summary: This is a summary of the Kookie Kids Products website. The website allows users to browse and purchase Kookie Kids products. The website has the following features: Home, Products, Cart, Signup / Login, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, Contact us. The products are categorized by Women, Men, and Kids. The brands available are POLO, H&M, MADAME, MAST & HARBOUR, BABYHUG, ALLEN SOLLY JUNIOR, KOOKIE KIDS, and BIBA. The products are displayed with their price and an 'Add to cart' button.

title: Automation Exercise - Tops & Shirts Products
summary: This webpage displays a list of 'Tops & Shirts' products for kids on an e-commerce site. It allows users to add products to the cart and view product details. The page also includes navigation links to Home, Products, Cart, Signup/Login, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, and Contact us. It also has category filters for Women, Men, and Kids, as well as brand filters.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a product (Lace Top For Women) on an e-commerce website. It shows the product's category, price, quantity input, availability, condition, brand, and a section for writing and submitting a review. It also includes website navigation links (Home, Products, Cart, Signup/Login, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, Contact us), product categories (WOMEN, MEN, KIDS), brands, and a subscription section.

title: Automation Exercise - Jeans Products
summary: This webpage displays jeans products for men in an online store. It includes navigation links for Home, Products, Cart, Signup/Login, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, and Contact us. The page features a category filter on the left, allowing users to filter by Women, Men, Kids, and Brands. The main content area showcases various jeans products with details like price and name, along with 'Add to cart' and 'View Product' options.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a product (Blue Top) on an e-commerce website. It shows the product's category (Women > Tops), price (Rs. 500), availability (In Stock), condition (New), and brand (Polo). It also allows users to add the product to their cart, write a review, and subscribe to updates.

title: Automation Practice for API Testing

links.text: API 2: POST To All Products List
API 4: PUT To All Brands List
API 7: POST To Verify Login with valid details
API 10: POST To Verify Login with invalid details

summary: This webpage provides a platform for API testing practice. It includes a list of APIs with scenarios for automation practice, covering functionalities like retrieving product lists, posting data, searching products, and user login verification.

title: Automation Exercise - Signup / Login
summary: This webpage provides options for users to either log in to an existing account or sign up for a new account. It also includes links to other pages such as Products, Cart, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, and Contact us. A subscription section is present, and a copyright notice is displayed at the bottom.

title: Automation Practice Website for UI Testing - Test Cases

links.text: Test Case 5: Register User with existing email
Test Case 7: Verify Test Cases Page
Test Case 10: Verify Subscription in home page
Test Case 11: Verify Subscription in Cart page
Test Case 12: Add Products in Cart
Test Case 13: Verify Product quantity in Cart
Test Case 16: Place Order: Login before Checkout

summary: The webpage provides a list of test cases for practicing UI automation on an e-commerce website. The test cases cover user registration, login, logout, contact form submission, and page verification.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a specific product, 'Madame Top For Women', including its category (Women > Tops), price (Rs. 1000), availability (In Stock), condition (New), and brand (Madame). It allows users to add the product to their cart, write and submit a review, and subscribe to receive updates.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a product, specifically a 'Long Maxi Tulle Fancy Dress Up Outfits - Pink'. It shows the product's category (Kids > Dress), price (Rs. 1600), availability (In Stock), condition (New), and brand (Biba). Users can add the product to their cart, write a review, and subscribe to receive updates.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a product (Colour Blocked Shirt – Sky Blue) on an e-commerce website. It includes product category, price, quantity input, availability, condition, brand, and a form to submit a review. It also shows product categories, brands, and a subscription section.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays product details for 'Frozen Tops For Kids' from the 'Allen Solly Junior' brand, categorized under 'Kids > Tops & Shirts'. It shows the price (Rs. 278), availability ('In Stock'), condition ('New'), and allows users to add the product to the cart, write a review, and subscribe to updates.

title: Automation Exercise - Mast & Harbour Products
summary: This webpage is for an e-commerce site, specifically for the brand Mast & Harbour. It displays a list of Mast & Harbour products, including winter tops and lace tops, with prices and 'Add to cart' buttons. The site also has categories for Women, Men, and Kids, as well as other brands. Navigation includes links to Home, Products, Cart, Signup/Login, Test Cases, API Testing, Video Tutorials, and Contact us.

title: Automation Exercise - Product Details
summary: This page displays the details of a product, 'Premium Polo T-Shirts', including its category (Men > Tshirts), price (Rs. 1500), availability (In Stock), condition (New), and brand (Polo). It also allows users to add the product to their cart, write and submit a review, and subscribe to receive updates.

It also allows users to add the product to the cart, write and submit a review, and subscribe to receive updates.

title: Automation Exercise - Contact Us
summary: The page is a 'Contact Us' form for the Automation Exercise website. It includes a contact form for testing purposes, a feedback section, and a subscription section.

summary: This page displays the details of a product, including its category, price, availability, condition, brand, and a form to write a review. It also includes options to add the product to the cart and a subscription section for updates.
